content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(0,0)
Consists of steam engine(position 0,0), boiler(position 0,1) and offshore pump (position 0,2)

### Copper plate mine at position(1,0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position 1,0) and a furnace at position(1,1)

### Copper cable factory at position(2,0)
Consists of following entities
- Assembling machine at position(2,1) and inserter at position(2,2) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position 2,3) that connects the furnace at position 1,1 to assembling machine at position(2,1)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing

### Errors related to insufficient resources
- Always check your inventory before crafting or placing entities to ensure you have the required materials.
